Meth addict Michael Tupago sentenced for $60k theft spree that spanned Auckland, Northland, Waikato https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/meth-addict-michael-tupago-sentenced-for-60k-theft-spree-that-spanned-auckland-northland-waikato/ZYFQIKQIIFFUBDNXHPGM5K5Q6M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/meth-addict-michael-tupago-sentenced-for-60k-theft-spree-that-spanned-auckland-northland-waikato/ZYFQIKQIIFFUBDNXHPGM5K5Q6M/ Craig KapitanFor years, he was a bane on North Island businesses. The methamphetamine addict was a serial thief who specialised in taking tip jars and donation boxes, but he says he's now turned his life around.

Then the house was sold to someone else.
